item.title: Andrew Ng's Prompt Engineering CourseğŸ§‘ğŸ»â€ğŸ“
item.description: I wasted a day of my weekend to take up a course about writing prompt to ChatGPTğŸ¤¡ Now I am writing a blog about what I learnt. I don’t know why I am doing this, I don’t know why I completed that course. At this point I don’t even know what am I doing with my life. I need some serious soul-searching. I hope this is just another phase for my character development and nothing more.
